webComponents.title: Web Components
webComponents.description: Web Components are a set of web platform APIs that allow you to create new custom, reusable, encapsulated HTML tags to use in web pages and web apps.

basic.title: Basic Usage
basic.description: Basic usage of Web Components with different variants.

sizes.title: Different Sizes
sizes.description: Web Components support four sizes: small, medium (default), large, and extra large.

shapes.title: Different Shapes
shapes.description: Web Components support three shapes: square, rounded (default), and circle.

borderRadius.title: Border Radius
borderRadius.description: Web Components support different border radius values: none, small, medium, large, circle, square, or a custom number value.

states.title: Different States
states.description: Web Components support disabled, loading, and active states.

properties.title: Properties
properties.borderRadius: The border radius of the component
properties.loading: Whether the component is in loading state
properties.active: Whether the component is in active state
